mapper.select:
select id, createDate, updateDate, createUser, updateUser, name from sys_role sr where 1 = 1
and name like concat('%',#{name} ,'%')
and updateUser in (select id from sys_user su where su.name like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%') or su.username like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%'))
and createUser in (select id from sys_user s where s.name like concat('%',#{createUser} ,'%') or s.username like concat('%',#{createUser} ,'%'))
and date (createDate) = date (#{createDate} )
and date (updateDate) = date (#{updateDate} )
and date (createDate) >= date (#{createDateStart} )
and date (createDate)<=date (#{createDateEnd} )
and date (updateDate)>= date (#{updateDateStart} )
and date (updateDate)<=date (#{createDateEnd} )
order by createDate desc
